verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man דַּבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- to the children עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha of thy people וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, upon אֶ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz upon a land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If אָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vi unto them When I bring עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; the sword וְלָקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu take עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad a מִקְצֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7097><s%> mik-tzei-Hem, of their coasts וְנָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu and set אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To לָהֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem לְצֹפֶֽה׃ <S%H6822><s%> le-tzo-Peh. him for their watchman

וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'Ah If when he seeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev the sword בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; upon the land וְתָקַ֥ע <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-Ka' he blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-Far the trumpet וְהִזְהִ֥יר <S%H2094><s%> ve-hiz-Hir and warn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. the people

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-Ma' Then whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֜עַ <S%H8085><s%> hash-sho-Me-a' heareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> hash-sho-Far of the trumpet וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and does not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> niz-Har, and taketh not warning וַתָּ֥בוֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-Ta-Vo come חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev if the sword וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-ka-Che-hu; and take him away דָּמ֥וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo his blood בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ve-ro-Sho shall be upon his own head יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-Yeh. become

אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <S%H7782><s%> hash-sho-Far of the trumpet שָׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' He heard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> niz-Har, and took not warning דָּמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo his blood בּ֣וֹ bo יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh; become וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he נִזְהָ֖ר <S%H2094><s%> niz-Har shall be upon him But he that taketh warning נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho his soul מִלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> mil-Let. shall deliver

וְ֠הַצֹּפֶה <S%H6822><s%> Ve-hatz-tzo-feh But if the watchman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if יִרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֶ֜רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev the sword בָּאָ֗ה <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah, come וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and does not תָקַ֤ע <S%H8628><s%> ta-Ka' and blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-Far not the trumpet וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- are not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> niz-Har, be not warned וַתָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo come חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev, if the sword וַתִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach and take מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh; [any] person ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity נִלְקָ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> nil-Kach, from among them he is taken away וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> ve-da-Mo but his blood מִיַּֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> mi-yad- hand הַצֹּפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> hatz-tzo-Peh at the watchman's אֶדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> 'ed-Rosh. will I require ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- So thou O son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man צֹפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> tzo-Peh thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha I have set לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-ma'-Ta therefore thou shalt hear מִפִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> mip-Pi at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <S%H2094><s%> ve-hiz-har-Ta and warn אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. at

בְּאָמְרִ֣י <S%H559><s%> be-'a-me-Ri When I say לָרָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> la-ra-Sha', unto the wicked רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' O wicked מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot [man] thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut, die וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not דִבַּ֔רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta, if thou dost not speak לְהַזְהִ֥יר <S%H2094><s%> le-haz-Hir to warn רָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko; from his way ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' that wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> ve-da-Mo but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-de-Cha at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Kesh. will I require

וְ֠אַתָּה <S%H859><s%> Ve-'at-tah your part כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if הִזְהַ֨רְתָּ <S%H2094><s%> hiz-Har-ta Nevertheless if thou warn רָשָׁ֤ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' the wicked מִדַּרְכּוֹ֙ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko of his way לָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv to turn מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah, at וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- does not שָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> shav from it if he do not turn מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko; from his way ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah your part נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Cha thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> hitz-Tzal-ta. but thou hast delivered ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Therefore O thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus אֲמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar-Tem Thus ye speak לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Surely פְשָׁעֵ֥ינוּ <S%H6588><s%> fe-sha-'Ei-nu If our transgressions וְחַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> ve-chat-to-Tei-nu and our sins עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; and וּבָ֛ם <S%H99999><s%> u-Vam אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we נְמַקִּ֖ים <S%H4743><s%> ne-mak-Kim [be] upon us and we pine away וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich how נִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> Nich-Yeh. in them how should we then live

אֱמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem unto חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- unto them [As] I live אָ֣נִי׀ <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I נְאֻ֣ם׀ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- no אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <S%H2654><s%> 'ech-Potz I have no pleasure בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> be-Mot in the death הָרָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> ha-ra-Sha', of the wicked כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- no בְּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> be-Shuv turn רָשָׁ֛ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' but that the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-Ko from his way וְחָיָ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> ve-cha-Yah; and live שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu turn שׁ֜וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu ye turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֧ם <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-chei-Chem ways הָרָעִ֛ים <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Im ye from your evil וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah Why תָמ֖וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mu-tu for why will ye die בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- and בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- unto the children עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha of thy people צִדְקַ֣ת <S%H6666><s%> tzid-Kat The righteousness הַצַּדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> hatz-tzad-Dik, of the righteous לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not תַצִּילֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H5337><s%> tatz-tzi-Len-nu shall not deliver בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom him in the day פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <S%H6588><s%> pish-'O, of his transgression וְרִשְׁעַ֤ת <S%H7564><s%> ve-rish-'At as for the wickedness הָֽרָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> ha-ra-Sha' of the wicked לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- he will not יִכָּ֣שֶׁל <S%H3782><s%> yik-Ka-shel he shall not fall בָּ֔הּ <S%H99999><s%> Bah, בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom thereby in the day שׁוּב֣וֹ <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vo that he turneth מֵֽרִשְׁע֑וֹ <S%H7562><s%> me-rish-'O; from his wickedness וְצַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-Dik, neither shall the righteous לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> yu-Chal be able לִֽחְי֥וֹת <S%H2421><s%> lich-Yot to live בָּ֖הּ <S%H99999><s%> bah בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom for his [righteousness] in the day חֲטֹאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2398><s%> cha-to-To. that he sinneth

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <S%H559><s%> be-'a-me-Ri When I shall say לַצַּדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> latz-tzad-Dik to the righteous חָיֹ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> cha-Yoh [that] he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh, live וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- he בָטַ֥ח <S%H982><s%> va-Tach if he trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in צִדְקָת֖וֹ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ka-To to his own righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah and commit עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> 'A-vel; iniquity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner; צִדְקָתֹו tzid-ka-tov כצִדְקֹתָיו֙ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ko-Tav his righteousness קלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <S%H2142><s%> tiz-za-Char-nah, shall not be remembered וּבְעַוְל֥וֹ <S%H5766><s%> u-ve-'av-Lo but for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of his which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah that he hath committed בּ֥וֹ <S%H99999><s%> bo יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut. he shall die

וּבְאָמְרִ֥י <S%H559><s%> u-ve-'a-me-Ri Again when I say לָֽרָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> la-ra-Sha' unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot Thou shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut; die וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav if he turn מֵֽחַטָּאת֔וֹ <S%H2403><s%> me-chat-ta-To, from his sin וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah. and right
